description.value: If the character has gained at least 2 Pain Tokens during an encounter, they may spend a Fate Point to gain the From Beyond Trait for the rest of the encounter. From Beyond: Immune to Fear, Pinning, Insanity, and Psychic Powers that would cloud, control, or delude your mind.

system.benefit: If the character has gained at least 2 Pain Tokens during an encounter, they may spend a Fate Point to gain the From Beyond Trait for the rest of the encounter. From Beyond: Immune to Fear, Pinning, Insanity, and Psychic Powers that would cloud, control, or delude your mind.
